com.octo.android.robospice
Class SpringAndroidContentService

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Context
      android.content.ContextWrapper
          android.app.Service
              com.octo.android.robospice.ContentService
                  com.octo.android.robospice.SpringAndroidContentService
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks
public abstract class SpringAndroidContentService
extends ContentService

This class offers a ContentService that injects a RestTemplate from spring android into every RestContentRequest it has to execute. Developpers will have to implement createRestTemplate() in addition to the usual ContentService.createCacheManager(android.app.Application) methods to create a RestTemplate and configure it.

Author:
sni
